General.Name: Spentex Industries Limited
General.Description: CLC Industries Limited, a textile company, engages in the manufacture and trading of synthetic and cotton yarns in India and internationally. It offers hosiery, weaving, carpet, and industrial yarns; sewing threads; and flat knitting products for use in home textiles and garments industry applications. The company was formerly known as Spentex Industries Limited and changed its name to CLC Industries Limited in July 2018. CLC Industries Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: A-60, Okhla Industrial Area, New Delhi, India, 110020
